definition: Huinong district of Shizuishan city 石嘴山市[Shi2 zui3 shan1 shi4], Ningxia
Gongnong district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang
Baisha Gongnong area in Dazhou 達州|达州[Da2 zhou1], Sichuan northeast Sichuan, amalgamated into Wanyuan county level city 萬源|万源[Wan4 yuan2] in 1993

sentences.english: A great variety of crops are likewise grown successfully on these plots.
sentences.chinese: 各种不同的作物也成功地在这些农区里生长。

sentences.english: Agroforestry systems research and development in the Asia and Pacific Region.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及太平洋区域农区林业系统研究和发展。

sentences.english: The dairy industry system is the important component in agriculture ecosystem in China.
sentences.chinese: 农区奶牛业系统是我国农业生态系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The agricultural districts should be main ones for human productive activities for economy.
sentences.chinese: 农区应当是人类生产经济活动的主要区域。

sentences.english: Hailun County is located in the high cold dryland farming area.
sentences.chinese: 海伦县属高寒旱作农区。

sentences.english: The new party was born in farming areas of the West and South.
sentences.chinese: 新党诞生于西部和南部农区。

sentences.english: Farming and urban communities, however, still hunt, although to a lesser degree.
sentences.chinese: 农区与都市社区仍然继续在猎捕，虽然程度较低。

sentences.english: Especially in the rural areas of south China, the obvious economic losses by heat stress have taken place.
sentences.chinese: 特别是在南方农区热应激造成的经济损失十分明显。

sentences.english: The cultivated acreage proportion is in high connection with Village electricity consumption.
sentences.chinese: 农区耕地面积比例与农村用电量有高关联等。

sentences.english: South China Agriculture Region is important production base for planting and stock raising.
sentences.chinese: 南方农区为我国种植业和畜牧业主要生产基地。

sentences.english: Funing county is typical plain farming district with little forestry resource.
sentences.chinese: 阜宁县是典型的平原农区，也是林业资源小县。

definition: Gadê or Gande county (Tibetan: dga' bde rdzong) in Golog Tibetan autonomous prefecture 果洛州[Guo3 luo4 zhou1], Qinghai
Madoi or Maduo county (Tibetan: rma stod rdzong) in Golog Tibetan autonomous prefecture 果洛州[Guo3 luo4 zhou1], Qinghai
Yuanzhou district of Guyuan city 固原市[Gu4 yuan2 shi4], Ningxia
Maqu county in Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘南藏族自治州[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu
Xilin Gol league, a prefecture level subdivision of Inner Mongolia
Subei Mongol autonomous county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
Bayan Nur prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia
Wuchuan county in Hohhot 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia
Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture/abbr. for 甘南藏族自治州
